pullrequest.title: Support mesh extrusion from polylines that consist of holes

content.raw:
I'm having trouble running this on osx. The `UNIT_GTSMeshUtils_TEST` test fails:
~~~
[ RUN      ] GTSMeshUtils.DelaunayTriangulation
/Users/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/common/GTSMeshUtils_TEST.cc:61: Failure
Value of: 8u
  Actual: 8
Expected: subMesh->GetVertexCount()
Which is: 0
/Users/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/common/GTSMeshUtils_TEST.cc:64: Failure
Value of: 8u
  Actual: 8
Expected: subMesh->GetIndexCount() / 3u
Which is: 0
[  FAILED  ] GTSMeshUtils.DelaunayTriangulation (8 ms)
~~~
Also, I see error messages  when I try to load `worlds/polyline.world`:
~~~
[Err] [MeshManager.cc:637] Unable to extrude mesh. Triangulation failed
[Err] [Visual.cc:2271] Unable to insert mesh[Vertex Buffer: Out of memory]
[Err] [MeshManager.cc:637] Unable to extrude mesh. Triangulation failed
[Err] [Visual.cc:2271] Unable to insert mesh[Vertex Buffer: Out of memory]
~~~

~~~
$ brew info gts
gts: stable 0.7.6
http://gts.sourceforge.net/
/usr/local/Cellar/gts/0.7.6 (24 files, 1.3M) *
  Built from source
From: https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew/blob/master/Library/Formula/gts.rb
==> Dependencies
Build: pkg-config ✔
Required: gettext ✔, glib ✔, netpbm ✔
==> Options
--universal
	Build a universal binary
~~~

I'm having trouble running this on osx. The UNIT_GTSMeshUtils_TEST test fails:

[ RUN      ] GTSMeshUtils.DelaunayTriangulation
/Users/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/common/GTSMeshUtils_TEST.cc:61: Failure
Value of: 8u
  Actual: 8
Expected: subMesh->GetVertexCount()
Which is: 0
/Users/scpeters/ws/gazebo_simbody/src/gazebo/gazebo/common/GTSMeshUtils_TEST.cc:64: Failure
Value of: 8u
  Actual: 8
Expected: subMesh->GetIndexCount() / 3u
Which is: 0
[  FAILED  ] GTSMeshUtils.DelaunayTriangulation (8 ms)

Also, I see error messages when I try to load worlds/polyline.world:

[Err] [MeshManager.cc:637] Unable to extrude mesh. Triangulation failed
[Err] [Visual.cc:2271] Unable to insert mesh[Vertex Buffer: Out of memory]
[Err] [MeshManager.cc:637] Unable to extrude mesh. Triangulation failed
[Err] [Visual.cc:2271] Unable to insert mesh[Vertex Buffer: Out of memory]

$ brew info gts
gts: stable 0.7.6
